content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (62.0, -54.0) and a burner inserter at position (62.5, -55.5)

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (107.5, -33.5) and a pipe group with multiple pipes connecting to it

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) and multiple pipes connecting to it

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5), a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5), and multiple pipes connecting to it

### Belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of a belt at position (63.5, -53.5) and another belt at position (64.5, -53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when placing entities too far away: Make sure to move to the target position before placing an entity.
* Errors when placing entities in occupied tiles: Ensure the target position is empty before placing an entity.
* Errors when inserting items into entities: Check that the required items are in the inventory before attempting to insert them.
* Errors when crafting items: Ensure that all required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting to craft an item.
* Errors when using entities: Check that the entity is properly fueled and connected to the required resources before using it.

# NAMESPACE
* Defined functions: 
  + place_entity: places an entity at a specified position
  + insert_item: inserts an item into an entity
  + craft_item: crafts an item using a recipe
* Important variables: 
  + coal: integer, represents the amount of coal in the inventory
  + stone: integer, represents the amount of stone in the inventory
  + furnace: entity, represents a stone furnace
  + inserter: entity, represents a burner inserter
  + offshore_pump: entity, represents an offshore pump
  + boiler: entity, represents a boiler
  + steam_engine: entity, represents a steam engine
  + small_electric_pole: entity, represents a small electric pole
  + belt: entity, represents a belt
  + pipe: entity, represents a pipe
  + pipe_group: entity, represents a group of pipes
  + electricity_group: entity, represents a group of electric poles
